fields.description: This is a list of the current Arch Linux Developers. They maintain the [core] and [extra] package repositories in addition to doing any other developer duties.
fields.name: Developers

fields.description: Here are all your friendly Arch Linux Trusted Users who are in charge of the [community] repository.
fields.name: Trusted Users

fields.description: Below you can find a list of ex-developers (aka project fellows). These folks helped make Arch what it is today. Thanks!
fields.name: Developer Fellows

fields.description: Below you can find a list of ex-trusted users (aka fellows). These folks helped make Arch what it is today. Thanks!
fields.name: Trusted User Fellows

fields.description: These are only a few of the unheralded people who keep the distro and the community running smoothly from behind the scenes. Official lists of wiki administrators and wiki maintainers are maintained on the wiki itself. The complete lists of forum administrators and forum moderators can be queried in the forums interface. IRC operators and mirror maintainers must also be mentioned for their indispensable work.
fields.name: Support Staff
